name: Phytowelt GreenTechnologies GmbH
goal:
Phytowelt GreenTechnologies GmbH is an internationally operating R&D company with core competences in industrial and plant biotechnology. Our services and process developments build a bridge between white and green biotechnology and tap the potential of plant biodiversity for the introduction of sustainable, industrial production processes using renewable raw materials.

The knowledge of plant secondary metabolites, their biosynthesis pathways and the enzymes involved, in combination with unique solutions to produce those metabolites and enzymes in micro organisms, is our key to success. Supplemented by the expertise to improve the breeding of plants by means of double haploids and protoplast fusion, this produces better renewable raw materials for bioenergy and biomaterials. With its expertise Phytowelt provides to its customers the best solution for a green, clean and sustainable production.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
JU-BBI und
Pflanzenschutz
Kernkompetenz der Pflanzenzüchtung sowie Pflanzenbiotechnologie
